attributes.action: ...call for an immediate one year freeze on rail fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned...

1) note that the Association of Train Operating Companies have announced a 6 per cent increase in the cost of regulated fares and up to 9% increase in unregulated fares for January 2008,

2) note that in the past, the government has offered fuel VAT freezes for motorists,

3) believe that in the current climate, with an economic downturn hitting individuals and families hard, and climate change exacerbating global problems, something must be done,

I) call on the government to demand a one year freeze on rail fares to help struggling families during the economic crisis, and

II) call on the government to show the same consideration for rail passengers as they have done at time to motorists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
